meanings.sent1: She accessorized her outfit with a sparkly necklace.
meanings.sent2: I always accessorize my phone with a cute case.
meanings.sent3: He accessorized his sandwich with extra pickles.
meanings.sent4: The artist accessorized the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The room was accessorized with beautiful curtains and rugs.

meanings.definition: Having accessories added to enhance appearance or functionality.
meanings.sent1: The accessorized car had shiny rims and a sleek spoiler.
meanings.sent2: She loved her accessorized backpack with extra pockets.
meanings.sent3: The accessorized dog wore a bow tie and sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: Her accessorized phone case was like a protective armor.
meanings.sent5: The accessorized room felt cozy with added throw pillows.
